text:
Parental bereavement leave and pay
	In the Schedule—
		Part 1 creates a statutory entitlement to parental bereavement leave,
		Part 2 creates a statutory entitlement to parental bereavement pay, and
		Part 3 contains related amendments.
Extent, commencement and short title
	An amendment or repeal made by the Schedule has the same extent as theprovision to which it relates.
	Section 1 and the Schedule come into force on such day as the Secretary ofState may by regulations made by statutory instrument appoint; and differentdays may be appointed for different purposes.
	This section comes into force on the day on which this Act is passed.
	This Act may be cited as the Parental Bereavement (Leave and Pay) Act 2018.
